img_to_text.name: Convertir Imagen a Texto
img_to_text.description: App to convert images to text, supports multiple types of images and is powered by Tesseract and its ability to detect more than 100 languages. It also has login functionality, so you can save the log of the transformations to text that are performed.

computecnicos.name: Computecnicos
computecnicos.description: Lading page for a computer technical service, showing customer ratings, with contact form and service ranking system.

job_1.description: Area where I am dedicated to solve tickets entered by real users of the Facturacion.cl platform, in which they indicate errors, improvements or flows not contemplated in the same. The corrections are used with PHP, JavaScript, HTML, CSS and PostgreSQL technologies.

job_2.description: Area where I was dedicated to develop new functionalities according to the requirements of the company, at this stage I documented and developed them. I used technologies such as PHP, JavaScript, HTML, CSS and PostgreSQL.

about.description:
My name is Marco Peña, Chilean graduated in Software Engineering, I have +2 years of experience in web development. Along my way developing software, I have realized how important technology is and how it can improve people's quality of life. I love learning new things and sharing my knowledge with others


My main goal is to help you create a unique and quality product that meets your expectations and needs.


Feel free to contact me if you have any questions or if you want to work with me.
